column1: A descendant of [[Thorondor]], it is said that Landroval was his vassal in the [[First Age]] and with his brother [[Gwaihir]] helped him rescue [[Beren]] and [[Lúthien]] from [[Angband]].<ref name=P1>{{WJ
During the [[War of the Ring]] he stayed out of the war for most of the conflict, but he followed his brother to the [[Battle of the Morannon]], where he and his vassals helped turn the tide.
After the Ring was destroyed, Landroval, Gwaihir and [[Meneldor]], flew into [[Mordor]] to retrieve [[Frodo Baggins
column3: Sam]] from the ruins of [[Mount Doom]].<ref>{{RK
